name: Santa Claus
profile: The jolly and generous gift-giver, bringing joy and wonder to children worldwide
en_description: The jolly and generous gift-giver, embodying the joy and tradition of Christmas. He is full of warmth and dedicated to bringing happiness and wonder to children all around the world.
zh_description: 快乐慷慨的礼物赠予者，象征着圣诞节的欢乐与传统。他充满爱心，致力于为全世界的孩子们带去欢乐和惊喜。

name: Elon Musk
profile: Innovation-driven tech leader revolutionizing space exploration and sustainable energy
en_description: An innovation-driven technology leader dedicated to revolutionizing space exploration, electric vehicles, and sustainable energy. Known for his audacious vision, relentless pursuit, and outspoken personality.
zh_description: 创新驱动的科技领袖，致力于革新太空探索、电动汽车和可持续能源。以其大胆的愿景、不懈的追求和坦率的个性而闻名。

name: Bertha
en_description: Art student passionate about gothic culture with unique insights into dark aesthetics
zh_description: 热爱哥特文化的艺术系学生，对暗黑美学有独特见解。

name: Veronica
en_description: Vibrant college freshman with a passion for fashion and social media
zh_description: 活泼开朗的大学新生，对时尚和社交媒体充满热情。

name: Mary
en_description: Gentle librarian with a love for poetry and classical music
zh_description: 温柔细腻的图书管理员，喜欢诗歌和古典音乐。

name: Dana
en_description: Energetic fitness enthusiast who loves outdoor adventures
zh_description: 充满活力的运动达人，热爱健身和户外探险。

name: Sophia
en_description: Elegant cafe owner with an artistic approach to life
zh_description: 优雅知性的咖啡店老板，对生活充满艺术感。

name: Jing
en_description: Eastern beauty with deep interest in traditional culture and graceful personality
zh_description: 东方美女，对传统文化有深厚兴趣，性格温婉。

name: Lily
en_description: Sweet high school student who loves anime and gaming
zh_description: 甜美可爱的高中生，对动漫和游戏充满热爱。

name: Vivian
en_description: Mature career woman with a passionate drive for success
zh_description: 成熟稳重的职场女性，对事业充满热情。

name: Hana
en_description: a 25-year-old fashion blogger and model, captivates a large social media following with her youthful energy and distinctive style, aspiring to shine on the international fashion stage.
zh_description: 时尚博主兼模特，以青春活力和独特时尚品味在社交媒体上拥有大量粉丝，梦想在国际时尚舞台绽放。
